results.question: ITEM nedir?
results.answer: ITEM, Landscape and Ecological Management Plan belgesinde yer alan bir tablo başlığıdır ve belirli proje faaliyetlerini veya açıklamalarını numaralandırmak için kullanılır; örneğin "ITEM 1.0" ifadesi "SETTING-OUT" (aplikasyon/yer tespiti) açıklamasını temsil etmektedir [Kaynak: Haunton Farmers Solar
results.source: Haunton Farmers Solar Project Landscape and Ecological Management Plan 5th October 2020 (3) (1).pdf

results.question: ITEM kaçtır?
results.answer:
Belgelerde "ITEM" veya madde numarası olarak belirtilen değerler şunlardır:

*   "SETTING-OUT" açıklaması için ITEM değeri 1.0 [Kaynak: Haunton Farmers Solar Project  Landscape and Ecological Management Plan 5th October 2020 (3) (1).pdf (Page 15)]
results.source: Haunton Farmers Solar Project  Landscape and Ecological Management Plan 5th October 2020 (3) (1).pdf (Page 15)

results.question: What is ITEM?
results.answer: ITEM 1.0 is SETTING-OUT [Source: Haunton Farmers Solar Project Landscape and Ecological Management Plan 5th October 2020 (3) (1).pdf, Page 15].
results.source: Haunton Farmers Solar Project Landscape and Ecological Management Plan 5th October 2020 (3) (1).pdf

results.question: DESCRIPTION nedir?
results.answer: "Description" (veya Technical Description), projenin "Genel Teknik Açıklaması" (General Technical Description) dokümanıdır [Kaynak: Technical Description_Rev01.docx, Tablo 1, Satır 5]. Bu dokümanın numarası 227-007-F-E-00015'tir [Kaynak: Technical Description_Rev01.docx, Tablo 1, Satır 7].
results.source: Technical Description_Rev01.docx

results.question: DESCRIPTION kaçtır?
results.answer: Projenin genel teknik açıklaması "General Technical Description" olarak belirtilmiştir [Kaynak: Technical Description_Rev01.docx, Tablo 1, Satır 5].
results.source: Technical Description_Rev01.docx

results.question: What is DESCRIPTION?
results.answer: The term refers to the **General Technical Description** of the project [Source: Technical Description_Rev01.docx, Table 1, Row 5]. This description is associated with Document Nº 227-007-F-E-00015 [Source: Technical Description_Rev01.docx, Table 1, Row 7].
results.source: Technical Description_Rev01.docx

results.question: What is the value of DESCRIPTION?
results.answer: The value of the description (listed under the document title) is General Technical Description [Source: Technical Description_Rev01.docx, Table 1, Row 5].
results.source: Technical Description_Rev01.docx

results.question: kg/ha nedir?
results.answer: "kg/ha", Landscape and Ecological Management Plan (LEMP) kapsamında tohum ekim oranlarını (Sowing Rates) ifade eden bir ölçü birimidir [Kaynak: Haunton Farmers Solar Project Landscape and Ecological Management Plan 5th October 2020 (3) (1).pdf, Sayfa 24]. İlgili dokümanda ekim oranı 40 kg/ha olarak
results.source: Haunton Farmers Solar Project Landscape and Ecological Management Plan 5th October 2020 (3) (1).pdf

results.question: kg/ha kaçtır?
results.answer: kg/ha değeri 40'tır. [Kaynak: Haunton Farmers Solar Project Landscape and Ecological Management Plan 5th October 2020 (3) (1).pdf, Sayfa 24]
results.source: Haunton Farmers Solar Project Landscape and Ecological Management Plan 5th October 2020 (3) (1).pdf

results.question: What is kg/ha?
results.answer: The sowing rate for kg/ha is 40. [Source: Haunton Farmers Solar Project Landscape and Ecological Management Plan 5th October 2020 (3) (1).pdf, Page 24]
results.source: Haunton Farmers Solar Project Landscape and Ecological Management Plan 5th October 2020 (3) (1).pdf

results.question: What is the value of kg/ha?
results.answer: The value of kg/ha is 40 [Source: Haunton Farmers Solar Project Landscape and Ecological Management Plan 5th October 2020 (3) (1).pdf, Page 24].
results.source: Haunton Farmers Solar Project Landscape and Ecological Management Plan 5th October 2020 (3) (1).pdf

results.question: kg/acre nedir?

Bu projede uygulanan kg/acre değeri 16'dır. [Kaynak: Haunton Farme

results.question: g/m2 nedir?
